title: Wtb: n172 Ewing stooping to field grounder
author: Econteachert205

posts.post_title: Wtb: n172 Ewing stooping to field grounder
posts.post_content: Hi, I'd like to buy this card.  Lower grade but with a nice image is what I'm looking for but will consider any example.   Can also do part trade part cash.
Bump.  I will consider any copy of this card and try to make it a good deal for you. Thank you to Jay for the info on the catalog number 149-7.
